title: Reflective Online Education Program for Pharmacy Preceptor Competency Enhancement (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in pharmaceuticals and preceptorship experience
context.additional_context: Combined program of real-time video lectures and asynchronous video learning in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Students improve preceptoring core competencies to 6.8/10+ within three months through 12 reflective learning tasks.
Students submit reflective questions with over 80% completion rate after viewing each video content.
Learners express a willingness to recommend the program to peers with a satisfaction rate of over 95% after completing the training.

resources: 12 reflective learning videos (total 6-8 hours of content)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
